评论详情: The material and size are very comfortable and it’s been through multiple washes and the design is holding strong so the quality is great!

The shirt is the wrong color I asked for green and received red I also got small instead of a medium the shipping was withheld aleast twice on my package but not their fault and it is durring the holidays and it is through Amazon the shirt itself is good quality and I can fit it since I’m not big guy I will not be returning due to I don’t want the same mistake happening again and waiting longer. Good quality shirt bad service on color and size
La camiseta es hermosa buena calidad.
The shirts more on the sturdy/thicker side. I got a medium and I’m 5’3 fits oversized.

This shirt is a comfortable shirt to wear around, Ive been wearing it for about 4 months or so and no color fading or any wear. Looks brand new I would recommend it to anyone wanting to up there style game.
Fits perfect. Thick material. Very nice print on the logo. Very nice seams, the only possible drawback is there’s thick seams on the inside of the shirt which may cause sensory issues for others
It's oversize but great fit, true to size and the material is great 👍🏻

评论概述: Faded and shrunk after the first wash
评论详情: I love the Aelfric Eden brand and this shirt was no exception.  The colors were vivid and the fit just right.....until I washed it.  After that, the colors faded quite a bit and it was just a little too small.  I'm disappointed that a shirt as much $ as this didn't look good longer.

Bought this for my son after he saw it on Amazon and asked me to buy it. I was skeptical but the quality is surprisingly nice. We sized up to make sure it wasn't too small. It washes well.  I line dry it to preserve it's longevity. Very nice shirt.
This is actually not my first shirt from this brand, and I love absolutely every piece I’ve gotten from them. Extremely thick fabric with beautiful coloring. I loved the design and how modern it is.

评论概述: A bit shorter and slimmer than other AE shirts
评论详情: This is definitely not the oversized fit you might be used to from this brand. It still fits, but just like a normal fit. High quality stitching and fabric as always though.
Really love the fit and style of the shirt. It’s a nice material as well.
Bought for my son, it’s a brand the teens love and he loves the shirt… it’s a boxy fit and was a little short on him as he’s 6’1” but he still Loves it
